Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class RotateNearestNeighbor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.RotateNearestNeighbor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class RotateNearestNeighbor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Rotate image using nearest neighbor algorithm. The class implements image rotation filter using nearest neighbor algorithm, which does not assume any interpolation. Rotation is performed in counterclockwise direction.
